meta.title: Pablo Gutierrez
meta.description: Passionate and creative frontend developer with experience in frontend technologies. Committed to creating intuitive, attractive, and user-centered interfaces.
meta.keywords: Pablo Gutierrez, Frontend Developer, Web Developer, Frontend Development, React, Web Development, Angular, Astro, Laravel, Code
meta.og_description: Passionate and creative frontend developer with experience in frontend technologies. Committed to creating intuitive, attractive, and user-centered interfaces.

inicio.description: I transform designs into code using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I have experience with frameworks like React, Astro, Angular, and Laravel. With the ability to consume APIs, I have developed interactive and responsive web applications. I am always seeking opportunities to learn and apply the latest trends in frontend technology, aiming to create intuitive and modern interfaces.
inicio.projects_info: In the Projects section, you can find some of the projects I have participated in as a frontend developer.

meta.title: Pablo Gutierrez - Home
meta.description: I am a frontend developer with experience in React, Angular, Laravel, and Astro. Explore my site to see how I can help you build modern and efficient web interfaces with the latest technologies.
meta.keywords: Home, Pablo Gutierrez, Frontend Developer, Web Developer, Frontend Development, React, Web Development, Angular, Astro, Laravel, Code
meta.og_description: I am a frontend developer with experience in React, Angular, Laravel, and Astro. Explore my site to see how I can help you build modern and efficient web interfaces with the latest technologies.

cv.description1: I enjoy developing user interfaces using the right technologies, as well as optimizing and implementing SEO for better positioning and website loading performance.
cv.description2: My journey in web development began as a teenager when I found myself amazed by the possibility of bringing ideas and concepts to life through code. I have worked on a variety of projects, from informational websites to online stores, always challenging myself and growing in the process.
cv.name: Pablo Yucra Gutierrez
education_items: Introduction to Web Development at Google Act√≠vate (Certificate ID: T3B YY6 RJ2)

projects.name: Human 3.0
projects.description: I developed the entire website based on a design provided in Figma, implemented the sections and functional forms with EmailJS. I used Angular, HTML, and CSS, ensuring a responsive design and optimal performance.

projects.name: CloudSEN12
projects.description: Developed additional sections and implemented Chart.js for charts using Astro, made changes to routes, links, and colors. Improved accessibility, SEO, page performance, and responsive design.

projects.name: KINTINY
projects.description: Developed cards, sliders, and added an animation to the WhatsApp button to enhance the user experience.

projects.name: DBA Express
projects.description: Developed additional sections and improved colors throughout the page. Developed all forms and handled data submission.

projects.name: Vivargo
projects.description: Developed modals and sliders with Angular.

projects.name: RAB Import
projects.description: Developed sliders, sections, forms, etc. Improved SEO and optimized the code.

projects.name: Qeswa travel
projects.description: Frontend developer in a web team. Used Laravel to connect the interface with the backend (HTML, CSS, JS). Collaborated with backend developers. Optimized performance and user experience.

projects.name: Expo Rab
projects.description: Experience as a frontend developer in a web team, using the Laravel framework to link frontend and backend. Coding with HTML, Bootstrap, CSS, JS. Collaboration with backend developers.

projects.name: Kaizen
projects.description: Worked as a frontend developer in a web team. Connected frontend and backend using Laravel. Used HTML, CSS, JS for the interface. Collaborated with designers and backend developers.

projects.name: La repuestera
projects.description: Developed the entire frontend of the page using Laravel as the backend.

projects.name: Rikea
projects.description: Frontend developer in a web team. Used Laravel to integrate frontend and backend. Coding with HTML, CSS, JS. Collaboration with designers and backend developers. Focus on performance optimization and user experience.

projects.name: TecniRapido y TecniBordado
projects.description: TecniRapido and TecniBordado are 2 pages in 1. I used HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript to design and implement the page's functionality.

politica.title: Privacy Policy
politica.personal_data: Personal Data: When visitors contact us through the form, we collect their name, email address, and the message they send.
politica.improve_site: To improve our website and provide a better user experience.
politica.support: To respond to your inquiries and provide customer support.
politica.adsense_info: We use Google AdSense to display ads on our website. Google AdSense may use cookies to personalize the ads you see from Google.
politica.gdpr: Compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
politica.gdpr_info: In compliance with the European Union‚Äôs General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), we respect your privacy rights and are committed to protecting your personal information. The information we collect is used solely for communication purposes and is not shared with third parties.
politica.security_info: We are committed to protecting the personal information you provide. However, please note that no method of transmission over the Internet or storage method is 100% secure.
